name: evans-sass-tools
description: My personal Sass/Scss mixins and more

scripts.build: node-sass --recursive examples/ --output examples/ & npm run sassdoc
scripts.release: npm test && git push && git push --tags
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --browser 'Google Chrome Canary' --files examples/**/*.html --files examples/**/*.css --server --startPath examples/ --directory
scripts.start: npm run clean && (npm run watch & npm run serve)
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch examples/ --watch lib/ --ext scss --exec 'npm run build'

author: Evan Lovely
